p: The incidence of NSI was 10.6 cases per 100 inpatients-bed per year and 4.1 cases per 100 workers per year in the surveillance system for NSI ( Table 7) ( 14). Additionally, the experience rate of NSI in health care workers was 51.2-96.7% according to other studies in Korea ( 15, 16). The crude incidence rate for work-related blood-exposure was 2.6 cases per 100 workers in a study performed at a university hospital in Korea ( 17). Estimated incidence of NSI in 36 Korean hospitals was 6.1 cases per 100 beds and 3.0 cases per 100 workers in 1 yr ( 18). Even though the indices of incidence differed between the surveillance project for NSI and the other studies, risk factors for NSI were similar.
